title: Font with tilted serifs, who knows this font?
content:
I was hoping somone could help me identify this font with the tilted serifs:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [schriftmuster.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725003350/http:/typophile.com/files/schriftmuster.jpg) | 41.94 KB |
author: mirimiri2

comments.content:
**[Charlemagne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725003350/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Charlemagne%20-%20Bold&fid=dc2e106af7e63b0af5d980895d374927&fsize=60&text=DESIGNPREIS&fit=1)** by Carol Twombly (Adobe, Design date: 1989-2002)

PS: I'm toooo slow
amazingly fast. You made my day.
